text: Came across Director Emily through a friend’s family member wake. She is so compassionate that I remember her when I need the service. Her team is filled with excellent members. All of them are as nice and helpful, just like her. Special mentioned about uncle Koh, who gives me the fatherly figure of guiding us every step with great patience. This is an industry whereby u must have the compassionate heart to deal with your clients. And I want to recommend that Hiap Hin is one company that put customer’s feelings first over anything. Thank you so much and I wish the team well in everything they are dealing with.

I was recommended this undertaker for my family member.  We are thankful for Director Emily and her team for the excellent service. They are helpful and patient whenever we need any service.  Her team member Mr Koh guiding us every step with clear information.  We are very appreciative of their good service. Thank you very much.
Excellent service and thoughtfulness especially in times like this. Thanks to the lady boss!
